page.title: 19SAMYA BHALOO'S THURSDAY
page.content: An average Thursday in my life is waking up at 8.00, having breakfast at 8.30 which is a cup of tea and toast. Then I go to my neighbours house and they take me to school, we reach there at 8.50. When we have assembly we have a hymn and sometimes a story. After assembly we have maths, then at 10.35 playtime. Then until lunchtime we have project work. Sometimes we do science or we start doing new things. Lunch- time is one hour, some people bring their own lunch but I have school dinners. After lunch we have PE for half an hour,then read the class book by Jan Needle. Playtime is at 2.10 and then swimming. We go to Copthall pool by coach. After swimming I go home by bus and have a bath. After my bath I either do homework or play with my friend Jessica. After dinner I watch TV and go to sleep at 9.00pm.
